pages.text: This dimension has tons of animals roaming around, amongst them there are $(item)Sheep$().$(br2)Your tools are not very sharp yet, you would probably just torture the poor animal if you tried retrieving their $(item)Wool$() while they are alive and kicking.$(br2)Luckily you can slay them for their $(item)Wool!$()
These shears are crude and won't help you trim a moving animal, they can however be used on a $(item)Worktable$().
The bricks you dried earlier will help you make a water resistant working surface.
Early on you get your string by cutting the $(item)Wool$() at a $(item)Mason's Worktable$() into String.$(br2)You can also get $(item)String$() from growing $(item)Hemp$().

pages.title: Retrieving Water
pages.text: Sifting requires $(l:sim_1/resources/2_fluids#water)Water$(), the worktable you made can hold $(l:sim_1/resources/2_fluids#water)Water$() but you must be able to transport it from point to point.$(br2)Use the worktable to make a compound that you can then smelt into bottles.
This will let you bash those ores into submission! Hah!$(br2)Check out the $(item)JEI Category$() for the $(item)Hammer$() to see what ores can be bashed into dust.
Now that you have water and some various crushed ores to sift through, all there is left to do is the Sifter itself.$(br2)Check the uses of a Sifter in $(item)JEI$() for more information.
